mapper.select: select place_seq, place_name, place_address, place_imgs , min(roomtype_price) as roomtype_price from (select p.place_seq, p.place_name, p.place_address ,p.place_imgs, p.place_environment, rt.roomtype_name, rt.roomtype_price, rt.roomtype_capacity, rt.roomtype_options from yonolja_room rm, yonolja_roomtype rt, yonolja_place p where rm.roomtype_seq = rt.roomtype_seq and rt.place_seq = p.place_seq ${param1} ) group by place_seq, place_name, place_address, place_imgs, place_environment

select nvl(avg(review_star),0) from yonolja_review review, yonolja_book book,yonolja_room room, yonolja_roomtype type, yonolja_place place where review.book_seq = book.book_seq and book.room_seq = room.room_seq and room.roomtype_seq = type.roomtype_seq and type.place_seq = place.place_seq and place.place_seq=#{param1}

select count(review_seq) from (select p.place_seq, p.place_name, rv.review_seq, rv.review_content from yonolja_review rv,yonolja_book b, yonolja_room rm, yonolja_roomtype rt, yonolja_place p where rv.book_seq = b.book_seq and b.room_seq = rm.room_seq and rm.roomtype_seq = rt.roomtype_seq and rt.place_seq = p.place_seq and p.place_seq = #{param1})
select rt.roomtype_options from yonolja_place p, yonolja_roomtype rt where p.place_seq = rt.place_seq and p.place_seq = #{param1}

select p.place_seq, p.place_name, p.place_checkin_time, p.place_checkout_time, rt.roomtype_seq, rt.roomtype_name, rt.roomtype_imgs, rt.roomtype_capacity, rt.roomtype_price, rt.roomtype_options, rt.roomtype_guide from yonolja_roomtype rt, yonolja_place p where rt.place_seq = p.place_seq and roomtype_seq = #{param1}

select count(*) from yonolja_review rv, yonolja_book b, yonolja_room rm, yonolja_roomtype rt where rv.book_seq = b.book_seq and b.room_seq = rm.room_seq and rm.roomtype_seq = rt.roomtype_seq and rt.roomtype_seq = #{param1}
